course_description: This course emphasizes soil's physical, chemical, and biological properties concerning plant growth, environment, and soil's place in our daily life. Students will learn the importance of soils to humans through the study of their morphology, properties, distribution, and biological significance.
prerequisites: ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - W502
